Package gov.sandia.geotess

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AttributeDataDefinitions
    A simple class used to associate a set of attribute names and units, and their data type, with an access index.
    Data
    Abstract class that manages the data values attached to single grid node in the model.
    DataArrayOfBytes
    A byte[] with nAttributes elements will be associated with each node of the model.
    DataArrayOfCustoms
    An array of DataCustom objects with nAttributes elements will be associated with each node of the model.
    DataArrayOfDoubles
    A double[] with nAttributes elements will be associated with each node of the model.
    DataArrayOfFloats
    A float[] with nAttributes elements will be associated with each node of the model.
    DataArrayOfInts
    A int[] with nAttributes elements will be associated with each node of the model.
    DataArrayOfLongs
    A long[] with nAttributes elements will be associated with each node of the model.
    DataArrayOfShorts
    A short[] with nAttributes elements will be associated with each node of the model.
    DataByte
    A single value of type byte will be associated with each node of the model.
    DataCustom
    Used to extend custom types.
    DataDouble
    A single value of type double will be associated with each node of the model.
    DataFloat
    A single value of type float will be associated with each node of the model.
    DataInt
    A single value of type int will be associated with each node of the model.
    DataLong
    A single value of type long will be associated with each node of the model.
    DataShort
    A single value of type short will be associated with each node of the model.
    Edge
    An Edge stores information about the connection between two adjacent vertices which separates two neighboring triangles.
    GeoTessExplorer
    A command line driven set of utilities that can be used to extract maps, vertical slices, boreholes and vtk plot files from aÆ’GeoTessModel.
    GeoTessGrid
    Manages the geometry and topology of a multi-level triangular tessellation of a unit sphere.
    GeoTessMetaData
    GeoTessMetaData stores basic information about a GeoTessModel.
    GeoTessModel
    GeoTessModel manages the grid and data that comprise a 3D Earth model.
    GeoTessModelUtils
    A collection of static utilities that extract organized information from a GeoTessModel.
    GeoTessModelUtils.Point
    Class that represents a single point on the earth as both a unit vector and as an xy point projected using a Robinson projection.
    GeoTessPosition
    Manages information about a single point at an arbitrary position in a GeoTessModel.
    GeoTessPositionLinear
    Perform linear interpolation for an arbitrary point in the 3D model.
    GeoTessPositionNatualNeighbor
    Implements the Natural Neighbor Interpolation algorithm of Sibson (1980, 1981).
    GeoTessUtils
    Collection of static functions to manipulate geographic information.
    GradientCalculator
    An attribute gradient calculator used to linearly estimate attribute gradients at arbitrary positions within a defining GeoTessModel.
    PointMap
    PointMap facilitates access to information in the model by providing a map between point IDs, vertex IDs, layer IDs and node IDs.
    Profile
    A Profile defines the distribution of Data along a radial profile through a single layer in a model.
    ProfileConstant
    A Profile defined by two radii and a single Data object.
    ProfileEmpty
    A Profile defined by two radii and zero Data.
    ProfileNPoint
    A Profile defined by two or more radii and an equal number of Data objects.
    ProfileSurface
    A Profile defined by zero radii and 1 Data object.
    ProfileSurfaceEmpty  
    ProfileThin
    A Profile defined by a single radius and a single Data object.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    GeoTessUtils.OSType  
    ProfileType
    There are 6 types of profiles: EMPTY : two radii and no Data THIN: one radius and one Data CONSTANT: two radii and one Data NPOINT: two or more radii and an equal number of Data SURFACE: no radii and one Data SURFACE_EMPTY: no radii and no Data
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    GeoTessException
    Title:
